sys_client_extension_point.description: Workaround for Classic Studio (/$studio.do) code which will only display code search hits for a hard-coded set of tables: - Create Implementation for UI Script in Global scope (use "Create implementation" below) - Set the "global" flag of the implementation to true - Should be be probably done only on your development instance - To run the fix, any list or record must be opened, afterwards the code search properly shows all found records
sys_client_extension_point.name: classic_studio_fix
